page.title: 13RECREATION GALA QUEEN
page.content: The culmination of Civic Week is the {Gala Day}on Saturday in a local park. It is to be hoped that the weather is good. The{Gala Queen}and her court attend in full panoply and she is crowned amid rejoicing.She will reign for the following year,lending her royal presence at many events. She is chosen by ballot from one of the local schools,in yearly rotation. In the morning there is a parade of fanciful floats,which passes through the gaily decorated town to a site where the floats are judged and prizes awarded. There is a fancy dress competition, bands playing and games of all sorts. That evening there are concerts and social events in the clubs. SUNDAY-Children's Film Show and a day of relaxation and perhaps relief.
